## About this Resource

{{< meta short-description >}}

### General

-   [NIH's Resource for Finding Data Repositories](https://sharing.nih.gov/data-management-and-sharing-policy/sharing-scientific-data/repositories-for-sharing-scientific-data) — Hint, narrow your search by selecting "NIDCD" in the *Institute or Center* column.
-   [Open Science Framework (OSF)](https://osf.io/) — Search for your population of interest and filter by files or project.

## Datasets
:::::: panel-tabset
## All Datasets
The following datasets share varying levels of data, from raw data to analytic data.

### Datasets
::: {#data-all}
:::

## Raw Datasets
*Raw data* is the original, unprocessed information collected directly from participants or instruments, such as audio recordings, sensor outputs, or survey responses.

### Datasets
::: {#data-raw}
:::

## Analytic Datasets
*Analytic data* is information that has been cleaned, coded, or transformed into a format ready for analysis; these types of datasets are often shared alongside publications to support computational reproducibility.

### Datasets
::: {#data-analytic}
:::
